scripts.cy:open_process: npm run prereport && cypress open --env key=$PYYPL_KEY,secret=$PYYPL_SECRET
scripts.cy:run_process: npm run prereport && cypress run --env key=$PYYPL_KEY,secret=$PYYPL_SECRET
scripts.cy:run_process_github_action: npm run prereport && cypress run --env key=$PYYPL_KEY,secret=$PYYPL_SECRET
